Welcome

Welcome! This flexible application enables both local and remote team collaboration through the use of tightly integrated components critical to efficient product development. It allows you to:

  • Store everything related to a project in one place. For example, a project may include text and binary files, change requests, requirements, tasks, and discussions about the project.

  • Improve project teamwork by accessing information and collaborating via a LAN, WAN, or the Internet.

  • Test more efficiently and reduce maintenance time due to the tight integration between version control and change requests.

  • Assign work and track who was responsible for a particular task and when it was performed.

  • Enjoy true client/server access to data.

The application's Windows client runs under Windows NT 4.0 SP 6 or later, Windows 2000, and Windows XP. The Cross-Platform client runs on platforms that support Java. The Web Edition can be set up to run internally or over the Internet.
